title: Context-aware multi-head self-attentional neural network model for next location prediction. (arXiv:2212.01953v2 [physics.soc-ph] UPDATED)

tldr: 本论文提出了一个面向上下文的多头自注意力神经网络模型，可以通过历史访问位置、时间和活动持续时间以及周围土地利用功能来预测个人的下一个位置。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a context-aware multi-head self-attentional neural network model that predicts an individual's next location using historical location visits, their visit time and activity duration, as well as their surrounding land use functions. The model outperforms existing methods in experiments on two large-scale GNSS tracking datasets.
